sentences.en: The convicted murderer and rapist is scheduled to be executed next Friday.
sentences.cn: 那名被判有罪的强奸杀人犯定于下周五执行死刑。

sentences.en: The police didn't believe her when she said the rapist was a stranger.
sentences.cn: 警方不相信她的话，因为她说那个罪犯是个陌生人。

sentences.en: The girl’s mother was also expelled from the church; the rapist was not.
sentences.cn: 女孩的母亲也被开除了教籍，但兽行的始作俑者却未遭绝罚。
